name: Single Player RRPS Demo
description:
Stolen from some other thing, it's a game all about outwitting your still incredibly dumb and shortsighted opponents. The rules are adjustable but the default settings require that you play 12 games of rock, paper, scissors, using a limited stock of each. To 'win' you must do so without losing all your stars (winning a game wins you a star, losing loses you one). Collect information on other players, be a happy merchant and trade for goods, or play randomly and maybe win anyway!

Bugfix: Other players won't sell you useless garbage information anymore (or at least, they won't sell you the same garbage twice)
